languages.text: {n}Соломон негромко вздыхает.{/n} "В таком случае мне лучше заняться отчетами".
{n}Solomorne sighs softly.{/n} "In that case, I'd better get started on those reports."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne soupire doucement.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je ferais mieux de m'atteler à la rédaction de ces rapports. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs softly.{/n} "In that case, I'd better get started on those reports."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne soupire doucement.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je ferais mieux de m'atteler à la rédaction de ces rapports. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはそっとため息をついた。{/n}「それなら、報告書に取りかかったほうがよさそうですね」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs softly.{/n} "In that case, I'd better get started on those reports."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはそっとため息をついた。{/n}「それなら、報告書に取りかかったほうがよさそうですね」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne suspira suavemente.{/n} «En ese caso, será mejor que empiece a preparar los informes».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs softly.{/n} "In that case, I'd better get started on those reports."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne suspira suavemente.{/n} «En ese caso, será mejor que empiece a preparar los informes».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙轻轻叹了口气。{/n}“既然如此，我还是尽早开始写报告吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs softly.{/n} "In that case, I'd better get started on those reports."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙轻轻叹了口气。{/n}“既然如此，我还是尽早开始写报告吧。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hafifçe iç çekiyor.{/n} "O hâlde raporlara bir an evvel başlayayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs softly.{/n} "In that case, I'd better get started on those reports."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hafifçe iç çekiyor.{/n} "O hâlde raporlara bir an evvel başlayayım."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne seufzt leise.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, mache ich mich besser an meine Berichte."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs softly.{/n} "In that case, I'd better get started on those reports."
